verses.verse: Doth not<WH3808> wisdom<WH2451> cry?<WH7121> and understanding<WH8394> put forth<WH5414> her voice?<WH6963>
She standeth<WH5324> in the top<WH7218> of high places,<WH4791> by<WH5921> the way<WH1870> in the places<WH1004> of the paths.<WH5410>
She crieth<WH7442> at<WH3027> the gates,<WH8179> at the entry<WH6310> of the city,<WH7176> at the coming<WH3996> in at the doors.<WH6607>
Unto <WH413> you, O men,<WH376> I call;<WH7121> and my voice<WH6963> is to<WH413> the sons<WH1121> of man.<WH120>
O ye simple,<WH6612> understand<WH995> wisdom:<WH6195> and, ye fools,<WH3684> be ye of an understanding<WH995> heart.<WH3820>
Hear; <WH8085> for<WH3588> I will speak<WH1696> of excellent things;<WH5057> and the opening<WH4669> of my lips<WH8193> shall be right things.<WH4339>
For <WH3588> my mouth<WH2441> shall speak<WH1897> truth;<WH571> and wickedness<WH7562> is an abomination<WH8441> to my lips.<WH8193>
All <WH3605> the words<WH561> of my mouth<WH6310> are in righteousness;<WH6664> there is nothing<WH369> froward<WH6617> or perverse<WH6141> in them.
They are all<WH3605> plain<WH5228> to him that understandeth,<WH995> and right<WH3477> to them that find<WH4672> knowledge.<WH1847>
Receive <WH3947> my instruction,<WH4148> and not<WH408> silver;<WH3701> and knowledge<WH1847> rather than choice gold.<WH4480> <WH977> <WH2742>
For <WH3588> wisdom<WH2451> is better<WH2896> than rubies;<WH4480> <WH6443> and all<WH3605> the things that may be desired<WH2656> are not<WH3808> to be compared<WH7737> to it.
I <WH589> wisdom<WH2451> dwell<WH7931> with prudence,<WH6195> and find out<WH4672> knowledge<WH1847> of witty inventions.<WH4209>
The fear<WH3374> of the LORD<WH3068> is to hate<WH8130> evil:<WH7451> pride,<WH1344> and arrogance,<WH1347> and the evil<WH7451> way,<WH1870> and the froward<WH8419> mouth,<WH6310> do I hate.<WH8130>
Counsel <WH6098> is mine, and sound wisdom:<WH8454> I<WH589> am understanding;<WH998> I have strength.<WH1369>
By me kings<WH4428> reign,<WH4427> and princes<WH7336> decree<WH2710> justice.<WH6664>
By me princes<WH8269> rule,<WH8323> and nobles,<WH5081> even all<WH3605> the judges<WH8199> of the earth.<WH776>
I <WH589> love<WH157> them that love<WH157> me; and those that seek me early<WH7836> shall find<WH4672> me.
Riches <WH6239> and honor<WH3519> are with<WH854> me; yea, durable<WH6276> riches<WH1952> and righteousness.<WH6666>
My fruit<WH6529> is better<WH2896> than gold,<WH4480> <WH2742> yea, than fine gold;<WH4480> <WH6337> and my revenue<WH8393> than choice<WH977> silver.<WH4480> <WH3701>
I lead<WH1980> in the way<WH734> of righteousness,<WH6666> in the midst<WH8432> of the paths<WH5410> of judgment: <WH4941>
That I may cause those that love<WH157> me to inherit<WH5157> substance;<WH3426> and I will fill<WH4390> their treasures.<WH214>
The LORD<WH3068> possessed<WH7069> me in the beginning<WH7225> of his way,<WH1870> before<WH6924> his works<WH4659> of old.<WH4480> <WH227>
I was set up<WH5258> from everlasting,<WH4480> <WH5769> from the beginning,<WH4480> <WH7218> or ever<WH4480> <WH6924> the earth<WH776> was.
When there were no<WH369> depths,<WH8415> I was brought forth;<WH2342> when there were no<WH369> fountains<WH4599> abounding<WH3513> with water.<WH4325>
Before <WH2962> the mountains<WH2022> were settled,<WH2883> before<WH6440> the hills<WH1389> was I brought forth: <WH2343>
While as yet<WH5704> he had not<WH3808> made<WH6213> the earth,<WH776> nor the fields,<WH2351> nor the highest part<WH7218> of the dust<WH6083> of the world.<WH8398>
When he prepared<WH3559> the heavens,<WH8064> I<WH589> was there:<WH8033> when he set<WH2710> a compass<WH2329> upon<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the depth: <WH8415>
When he established<WH553> the clouds<WH7834> above:<WH4480> <WH4605> when he strengthened<WH5810> the fountains<WH5869> of the deep: <WH8415>

When he gave<WH7760> to the sea<WH3220> his decree,<WH2706> that the waters<WH4325> should not<WH3808> pass<WH5674> his commandment:<WH6310> when he appointed<WH2710> the foundations<WH4146> of the earth: <WH776>
Then I was<WH1961> by<WH681> him, as one brought up<WH525> with him: and I was<WH1961> daily<WH3117> <WH3117> his delight,<WH8191> rejoicing<WH7832> always<WH3605> <WH6256> before<WH6440> him;
Rejoicing <WH7832> in the habitable part<WH8398> of his earth;<WH776> and my delights<WH8191> were with<WH854> the sons<WH1121> of men.<WH120>
Now <WH6258> therefore hearken<WH8085> unto me, O ye children:<WH1121> for blessed<WH835> are they that keep<WH8104> my ways.<WH1870>
Hear <WH8085> instruction,<WH4148> and be wise,<WH2449> and refuse<WH6544> it not.<WH408>
Blessed <WH835> is the man<WH120> that heareth<WH8085> me, watching<WH8245> daily<WH3117> <WH3117> at<WH5921> my gates,<WH1817> waiting<WH8104> at the posts<WH4201> of my doors.<WH6607>
For <WH3588> whoso findeth<WH4672> me findeth<WH4672> life,<WH2416> and shall obtain<WH6329> favor<WH7522> of the LORD.<WH4480> <WH3068>
But he that sinneth against<WH2398> me wrongeth<WH2554> his own soul:<WH5315> all<WH3605> they that hate<WH8130> me love<WH157> death.<WH4194>
